{{Character | character name = Steven Fisher | image = [[image:steven.jpg|250px]] | ep = [[The One With Five Steaks And An Eggplant]] | number = 1 | actor = [[Chris Young]] | name = Steven Fisher | nickname = Steve
Little Stevie Fisher | gender = Male | occ = Lawyer }} '''Steven Fisher''' is a lawyer whose firm represents [[Hootie and the Blowfish]]. He was portayed by [[Chris Young]] in "[[The One With Five Steaks And An Eggplant]]". At a Hootie and the Blowfish concert, Steven recognizes [[Monica Geller|Monica]] who used to babysit him when he was 8. He tells her his law firm represents the band and arranges a meeting between the band and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]], [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and [[Ross Geller|Ross]]. Rachel also used to babysit Steven. [[Category:Season 2 Characters]] [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Characters]]
